EmailTemplate.name: 202101_CH_Global_Webinar_MSP_Nacelle.202101_CH_Global_MSP_Nacelle_Email1_DR
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date – Webinar: How to Promote and Sell the MSP HTF Nacelle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Join Honeywell’s Aftermarket Sales Manager, Christopher Jordan, and Technical Sales Manager, Steve Gomez, for our upcoming webinar – How to promote and sell the MSP HTF Nacelle.
Designed specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will provide an in-depth review on how to promote and sell our latest coverage options for the HTF Propulsion Engine. Our newly launched MSP HTF Nacelle completes the coverage for everything associated with this engine.
After attending this webinar, you'll be well versed in understanding the program´s value proposition, features and coverage options, available platforms, pre-requisites and requirements for enrollment and benefits for customers. REGISTER NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_CEJ0geh-RKmlsdhkDCMtqA]]> This webinar is intended for Honeywell Channel Partners only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/b0000GIqXQq0X0YX020000Z]]> to let us know!
